title: Getting Started
text:
This page has been designed for help you take notes and find reference them at a central location.

Enter a title on the line above and write your note here at the body. Once you are satisfied with your note, select the save icon in the top right. The note will then be stored to the left.

At any point, you can click  on a saved note and view it in this section. If you would like to write a new note, click on the pencil icon in the top right corner. You can also delete a saved note at any point by clicking on the trash can icon next to the note.
